export var getDistance=function getDistance(lat1,lon1,lat2,lon2){var R=6371;// Radius of the earth in km
var dLat=deg2rad(lat2-lat1);// deg2rad below
var dLon=deg2rad(lon2-lon1);var a=Math.sin(dLat/2)*Math.sin(dLat/2)+Math.cos(deg2rad(lat1))*Math.cos(deg2rad(lat2))*Math.sin(dLon/2)*Math.sin(dLon/2);var c=2*Math.atan2(Math.sqrt(a),Math.sqrt(1-a));var d=R*c;// Distance in km
return d;};var deg2rad=function deg2rad(deg){return deg*(Math.PI/180);};
